sections.title: External links

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Requirement R1 is related to the lead section and its definition. This external links section does not define the scope of the article.
Relevant for gene articles as this section categorizes the gene on a human chromosome.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section includes a category for 'Genes on human chromosome 18'.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Strong adherence with the presence of relevant category information, though additional specifics could enhance completeness.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Requirement R5 pertains to notable contributions and discovery, which are not relevant to the external links section.

sections.meta_notes: The section is appropriate for its purpose, providing categorical linkage but could include more comprehensive relevant external resources.
